verses.verse: וַיִּתְחַתֵּ֣ן <WH2859> made affinity שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> And Solomon אֶת־ <WH854> with פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> with Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> בַּת־ <WH1323> daughter פַּרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> Pharaoh's וַיְבִיאֶ֙הָ֙ <WH935> and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to עִ֣יר <WH5892> her into the city דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> of David עַ֣ד <WH5704> until כַּלֹּת֗וֹ <WH3615> until he had made an end לִבְנ֤וֹת <WH1129> of building אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> his own house וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> חוֹמַ֥ת <WH2346> and the wall יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

רַ֣ק <WH7535> but הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> Only the people מְזַבְּחִ֖ים <WH2076> sacrificed בַּבָּמ֑וֹת <WH1116> in high places כִּ֠י <WH3588> because לֹא־ <WH3808> no נִבְנָ֥ה <WH1129> built בַ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> because there was no house לְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> unto the name יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הַיָּמִ֥ים <WH3117> until those days הָהֵֽם׃ <WH1992> those פ

וַיֶּאֱהַ֤ב <WH157> loved שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> And Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לָלֶ֕כֶת <WH1980> walking בְּחֻקּ֖וֹת <WH2708> in the statutes דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father רַ֚ק <WH7535> but בַּבָּמ֔וֹת <WH1116> in high places ה֥וּא <WH1931> he מְזַבֵּ֖חַ <WH2076> only he sacrificed וּמַקְטִֽיר׃ <WH6999> and burnt incense

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king גִּבְעֹ֙נָה֙ <WH1391> to Gibeon לִזְבֹּ֣חַ <WH2076> to sacrifice שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הִ֖יא <WH1931> there for that הַבָּמָ֣ה <WH1116> high place הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> [was] the great אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> a thousand עֹלוֹת֙ <WH5930> burnt offerings יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> offer שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> did Solomon עַ֖ל <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֥חַ <WH4196> upon that altar הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

בְּגִבְע֗וֹן <WH1391> In Gibeon נִרְאָ֧ה <WH7200> appeared יְהֹוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> to Solomon בַּחֲל֣וֹם <WH2472> in a dream הַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> by night וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> and God שְׁאַ֖ל <WH7592> Ask מָ֥ה <WH4100> what אֶתֶּן־ <WH5414> what I shall give לָֽךְ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> And Solomon אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> You עָשִׂ֜יתָ <WH6213> Thou hast shewed עִם־ <WH5973> toward עַבְדְּךָ֙ <WH5650> unto thy servant דָוִ֣ד <WH1732> David אָבִי֮ <WH1> my father חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> mercy גָּדוֹל֒ <WH1419> great כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> he הָלַ֨ךְ <WH1980> according as he walked לְפָנֶ֜יךָ <WH6440> before בֶּאֱמֶ֧ת <WH571> thee in truth וּבִצְדָקָ֛ה <WH6666> and in righteousness וּבְיִשְׁרַ֥ת <WH3483> and in uprightness לֵבָ֖ב <WH3824> of heart עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> toward וַתִּשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> with thee and thou hast kept ל֗וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֤סֶד <WH2617> kindness הַגָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> for him this great הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this וַתִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> that thou hast given ל֥וֹ בֵ֛ן <WH1121> him a son יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> to sit עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֖וֹ <WH3678> on his throne כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And now O LORD אֱלֹהָ֔י <WH430> my God אַתָּה֙ <WH859> You הִמְלַ֣כְתָּ <WH4427> king אֶֽת־ <WH853> עַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> thou hast made thy servant תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> place דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> instead of David אָבִ֑י <WH1> my father וְאָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I נַ֣עַר <WH5288> child קָטֹ֔ן <WH6996> and I [am but] a little לֹ֥א <WH3808> not אֵדַ֖ע <WH3045> I know צֵ֥את <WH3318> not [how] to go out וָבֹֽא׃ <WH935> or come in

וְעַ֨בְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> And thy servant בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> [is] in the midst עַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> of thy people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בָּחָ֑רְתָּ <WH977> which thou hast chosen עַם־ <WH5971> people רָ֕ב <WH7227> a great אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִמָּנֶ֛ה <WH4487> that cannot be numbered וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or יִסָּפֵ֖ר <WH5608> nor counted מֵרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> for multitude

וְנָתַתָּ֨ <WH5414> Give לְעַבְדְּךָ֜ <WH5650> therefore thy servant לֵ֤ב <WH3820> heart שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> an understanding לִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <WH8199> to judge אֶֽת־ <WH853> עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> thy people לְהָבִ֖ין <WH995> that I may discern בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between ט֣וֹב <WH2896> between good לְרָ֑ע <WH7451> and bad כִּ֣י <WH3588> For מִ֤י <WH4310> who יוּכַל֙ <WH3201> for who is able לִשְׁפֹּ֔ט <WH8199> to judge אֶת־ <WH853> עַמְּךָ֥ <WH5971> people הַכָּבֵ֖ד <WH3515> this thy so great הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיִּיטַ֥ב <WH3190> pleasing הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> And the speech בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> the sight אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> the Lord כִּ֚י <WH3588> for שָׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> had asked שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> that Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> And God אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about יַעַן֩ <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> you שָׁאַ֜לְתָּ <WH7592> unto him Because thou hast asked אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor שָׁאַ֨לְתָּ <WH7592> and hast not asked לְּךָ֜ יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> life רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> for thyself long וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor שָׁאַ֤לְתָּ <WH7592> neither hast asked לְּךָ֙ עֹ֔שֶׁר <WH6239> riches וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor שָׁאַ֖לְתָּ <WH7592> for thyself nor hast asked נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> the life אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <WH341> of thine enemies וְשָׁאַ֧לְתָּ <WH7592> but hast asked לְּךָ֛ הָבִ֖ין <WH995> for thyself understanding לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <WH8085> to discern מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> judgment

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> Behold I have done כִּדְבָרֶ֑יךָ <WH1697> according to thy words הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> lo I have given לְךָ֗ לֵ֚ב <WH3820> heart חָכָ֣ם <WH2450> thee a wise וְנָב֔וֹן <WH995> and an understanding אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> so כָּמ֙וֹךָ֙ <WH3644> like לֹא־ <WH3808> no הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> has been לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> so that there was none like thee before וְאַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <WH310> thee neither after לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יָק֥וּם <WH6965> thee shall any arise כָּמֽוֹךָ׃ <WH3644> like

וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> have also אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> what לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שָׁאַ֙לְתָּ֙ <WH7592> thee that which thou hast not asked נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> And I have also given לָ֔ךְ גַּם־ <WH1571> both עֹ֖שֶׁר <WH6239> both riches גַּם־ <WH1571> have also כָּב֑וֹד <WH3519> and honour אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> so לֹא־ <WH3808> not הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become כָמ֥וֹךָ <WH3644> like אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> so that there shall not be any בַּמְּלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> among the kings כָּל־ <WH3605> all יָמֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3117> like unto thee all thy days

וְאִ֣ם ׀ <WH518> If תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> did walk בִּדְרָכַ֗י <WH1870> in my ways לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <WH8104> to keep חֻקַּי֙ <WH2706> my statutes וּמִצְוֹתַ֔י <WH4687> and my commandments כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after הָלַ֖ךְ <WH1980> walked דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> David אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> as thy father וְהַאַרַכְתִּ֖י <WH748> then I will lengthen אֶת־ <WH853> יָמֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3117> thy days ס

וַיִּקַ֥ץ <WH3364> awoke שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> And Solomon וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold חֲל֑וֹם <WH2472> and behold [it was] a dream וַיָּב֨וֹא <WH935> And he came יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֣ד ׀ <WH5975> and stood לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> of the Lord וַיַּ֤עַל <WH5927> and offered up עֹלוֹת֙ <WH5930> burnt offerings וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> and offered שְׁלָמִ֔ים <WH8002> peace offerings וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and made מִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <WH4960> a feast לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <WH5650> to all his servants פ

וַתָּקָם֩ <WH6965> And she arose בְּת֨וֹךְ <WH8432> the middle הַלַּ֜יְלָה <WH3915> of the night וַתִּקַּ֧ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנִ֣י <WH1121> my son מֵֽאֶצְלִ֗י <WH681> from beside וַאֲמָֽתְךָ֙ <WH519> me while thine handmaid יְשֵׁנָ֔ה <WH3463> slept וַתַּשְׁכִּיבֵ֖הוּ <WH7901> and laid בְּחֵיקָ֑הּ <WH2436> it in her bosom וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנָ֥הּ <WH1121> child הַמֵּ֖ת <WH4191> her dead הִשְׁכִּ֥יבָה <WH7901> and laid בְחֵיקִֽי׃ <WH2436> in my bosom

וָאָקֻ֥ם <WH6965> And when I rose בַּבֹּ֛קֶר <WH1242> in the morning לְהֵינִ֥יק <WH3243> suck אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנִ֖י <WH1121> to give my child וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold מֵ֑ת <WH4191> behold it was dead וָאֶתְבּוֹנֵ֤ן <WH995> but when I had considered אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> in בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> it in the morning וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> behold לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> was not בְנִ֖י <WH1121> behold it was not my son אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom יָלָֽדְתִּי׃ <WH3205> which I did bear

וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said הָאִשָּׁ֨ה <WH802> woman הָאַחֶ֜רֶת <WH312> And the other לֹ֣א <WH3808> No כִ֗י <WH3588> for בְּנִ֤י <WH1121> [is] my son הַחַי֙ <WH2416> Nay but the living וּבְנֵ֣ךְ <WH1121> [is] thy son הַמֵּ֔ת <WH4191> and the dead וְזֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise אֹמֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH559> And this said לֹ֣א <WH3808> No כִ֔י <WH3588> one בְּנֵ֥ךְ <WH1121> [is] thy son הַמֵּ֖ת <WH4191> No but the dead וּבְנִ֣י <WH1121> [is] my son הֶחָ֑י <WH2416> and the living וַתְּדַבֵּ֖רְנָה <WH1696> Thus they spake לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king
